headline.main: Airlines Try to Save Time With Speedier Boarding Process
headline.print_headline: Airlines Try to Save Time With Speedier Boarding Process

docs.snippet: Airlines are trying to save time by speeding up a part of flying that creates delays even before the plane leaves the gate: the boarding process....
docs.lead_paragraph: Airlines are trying to save time by speeding up a part of flying that creates delays even before the plane leaves the gate: the boarding process.

headline.main: Big 7th Inning Helps Astros Rally for 5-2 Win Over Orioles
headline.print_headline: Big 7th Inning Helps Astros Rally for 5-2 Win Over Orioles

docs.snippet: Evan Gattis drove in two runs in a four-run seventh inning and the Houston Astros continued their late-inning magic as they rallied for a 5-2 victory over the Baltimore Orioles on Monday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Evan Gattis drove in two runs in a four-run seventh inning and the Houston Astros continued their late-inning magic as they rallied for a 5-2 victory over the Baltimore Orioles on Monday night.

headline.main: Homeland to Revise Airport Screening; TSA Head Reassigned
headline.print_headline: Homeland to Revise Airport Screening; TSA Head Reassigned

docs.snippet: Homeland Security Secretary Jeh Johnson on Monday reassigned the leader of the Transportation Security Administration and directed the agency to revise airport security procedures, retrain officers and retest screening equipment in airports across...
docs.lead_paragraph: Homeland Security Secretary Jeh Johnson on Monday reassigned the leader of the Transportation Security Administration and directed the agency to revise airport security procedures, retrain officers and retest screening equipment in airports across the country.

headline.main: Phoenix Suing FAA Over Noisy Flight Path Changes in City
headline.print_headline: Phoenix Suing FAA Over Noisy Flight Path Changes in City

docs.snippet: Phoenix is suing the Federal Aviation Administration over flight path changes that have led to aircraft noise that's plaguing some historic neighborhoods....
docs.lead_paragraph: Phoenix is suing the Federal Aviation Administration over flight path changes that have led to aircraft noise that's plaguing some historic neighborhoods.

headline.main: Many missing in China ship disaster
headline.sub: Many missing in China ship disaster

docs.snippet: A search and rescue operation is underway after a ship carrying 458 passengers and crew sinks in the Yangtze river. Paul Chapman reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: A search and rescue operation is underway after a ship carrying 458 passengers and crew sinks in the Yangtze river. Paul Chapman reports.

headline.main: Judge Awards Billions to Quebec Smokers
headline.print_headline: Judge Awards Billions to Quebec Smokers

docs.snippet: A judge has awarded more than $15 billion Canadian (US$12 billion) to Quebec smokers in a case that pitted them against three giant tobacco companies. The case is believed to be the biggest class-action lawsuit ever seen in Canada....
docs.lead_paragraph: A judge has awarded more than $15 billion Canadian (US$12 billion) to Quebec smokers in a case that pitted them against three giant tobacco companies. The case is believed to be the biggest class-action lawsuit ever seen in Canada.

headline.main: Pele Happy to See Cosmos Match Play Role in U.S.-Cuba Detente
headline.print_headline: Pele Happy to See Cosmos Match Play Role in U.S.-Cuba Detente

docs.snippet: Brazilian football great Pele said he was pleased Tuesday's friendly between the Cuban national team and his former club the New York Cosmos might help foster better relations between the United States and Cuba, which have embarked on detente....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazilian football great Pele said he was pleased Tuesday's friendly between the Cuban national team and his former club the New York Cosmos might help foster better relations between the United States and Cuba, which have embarked on detente.

headline.main: New Prosecutor for Retrial of Deli Worker in New York Boy's Murder
headline.print_headline: New Prosecutor for Retrial of Deli Worker in New York Boy's Murder

docs.snippet: The lead prosecutor in the Etan Patz murder trial, which ended in a mistrial with a hung jury last month, has stepped down to run for office and a new prosecutor will retry the case, local media reported on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The lead prosecutor in the Etan Patz murder trial, which ended in a mistrial with a hung jury last month, has stepped down to run for office and a new prosecutor will retry the case, local media reported on Monday.

headline.main: Arizona Mosque, Site of Anti-Islam Protest, Holds 'Love Not Hate' Event
headline.print_headline: Arizona Mosque, Site of Anti-Islam Protest, Holds 'Love Not Hate' Event

docs.snippet: An Arizona mosque where hundreds gathered last week for an anti-Islam demonstration, with counterprotesters shouting "Go home, Nazis," was the site of a "love not hate" event on Monday to promote peace and inclusiveness, participants said....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Arizona mosque where hundreds gathered last week for an anti-Islam demonstration, with counterprotesters shouting "Go home, Nazis," was the site of a "love not hate" event on Monday to promote peace and inclusiveness, participants said.
